Summary: A high altitude object with three individual objects connected to each other by a flexible connection of some sort flew over Pasadena area, hover one direction, then turning and flying straight up.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt a restaurant called, "Il Fornaio", eating at outside patio. Saw object flying in distance. Surrounding tables and waiters all saw object and all observed it for the 20 minutes it flew overhead. Could not be weather balloons because of how it changed directions because it was so high up, jet stream would have sent it in one specific direction. At least thirty patrons and restaurant workers all responded the same way and observed it until the object disappeared while heading directly upwards.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around July 10th 2005
